DESCRIPTION: A special defensive value. When Block is depleted, Barrier absorbs the remaining damage. Barrier does not expire at the end of your turn.
Whenever your Barrier takes damage from an enemy, deal damage equal to your #yJudgment to the attacker.
At the end of your turn, deal damage to ALL enemies equal to your #yThorn #yAura.
Players with #yArmistice cannot play Attacks. Enemies with #yArmistice will skip their turn if they intend to attack.
Curses brought by the wolves of Syracusa. They possess powerful effects but also bring chaos.
While this ability is active, gain additional Energy and draw cards whenever you take damage.
